abstract: Seth Schiesel reviews video game Batman: Arkham City, developed by Rocksteady Studios and released by Warner Brothers for the PlayStation 3.
snippet: Batman: Arkham City, from Warner Brothers, an expansive urban sequel to Arkham Asylum from 2009, joins the pantheon of great single-player open-world games.
lead_paragraph: Batman: Arkham City, from Warner Brothers, an expansive urban sequel to Arkham Asylum from 2009, joins the pantheon of great single-player open-world games.

headline.main: You, Batman, Must Keep Arkham City in Line
headline.print_headline: You, Batman, Must Keep Arkham City in Line
headline.seo: You, Batman, Keep Arkham City in Line - Review
